}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== Per the FCC photos, this device is using three '''Microsemi''' LX5511 2.4 GHz Power Amplifier ICs (marked "MSC", "5511", "752B").
The same card is pictured in the FCC filing for the A2 revision.
[[Category:English Documentation]]
